reference.title: cxxStructDeclarationFile
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the source file where the struct is located.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStructDeclarationFile> element is defined within <cxxStructAPIItemLocation>. The only content of the element <cxxStructDeclarationFile> is the required attributes name and value. name is always "filePath" and value is the actual file path.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxStructDefinition> <cxxStructAccessSpecifier value="public" /> <cxxStructAPIItemLocation> <cxxStructDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="s:/sf/os/commsfw/commsconfig/commsdatabaseshim/commdbshim/SCDB/CDBTABLE.CPP" /> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="36" /> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="41" /> </cxxStructAPIItemLocation> </cxxStructDefinition>
